original: Magnusson, Karl Hilding, trädgårdsmästare, riksgäldsfullmäktig, Skövde, f. 17/12/77 i Hänger, Jönköp. 1., av Erik M. o. Ingrid Larsdotter. G. 05 m. Anna Brulin. Barn: Lars f. 08, Anna-Stina 10, Maja 12, Britta 13, Karl 14, Gunborg 16, Märta 18, Arne 20, Karin 22. — Stud. v. Dalarnas folk högs k. 96-97, Sv. trädg:fören. trädg:sk. 98-00, yrlvesstud. i Tyskl. 00-01. Stud:resor m. statsunderstöd i Tyskl., Höll. o. Belg. 11. Trädg:mäst. 01-07, grund, plantsk. Convallaria i Skövde 07. Nämndeman sed. 11, led. av kyrkorådet 14-24, stadsfullm. (h) sed. 17, be-redn :utsk., tax:nd, riksd. andra kamm. sed. 15, suppl. i tillf. utsk. 15-17, sär-sk. utsk. 26, bevilln :utsk. o. lagutsk. 20, led. av andra lagutsk. 21-34, därunder v. ordf. 32-34, led. av statsutsk. 35, särsk. utsk. 36, statsrev. 27 o. 30-32, ordf. 31-32, andre vice talman 38, förste talman 40, riksgäldsfullmäktig sed. 36, postsparbanksfullm. sed. 40, led. av 30 års försv:komm., befolkn :komm., allm. civilförvaltn. lönend, kommunik:-verkens lönend o. för sv :väs. lönend 34, kulturm :vårds’sakk. sed. 36, statens lä-rO’bok’snd, 42 års försv:utsk., landstinget o. dess förvaltn :utsk., hushåll-n:sällsk. förvaltn :utsk., högerpart. för-tr :råd m. m. Skr.: fackl. o. polit. upps. Hobbies: blommor o. växter, sportfiske, boksaml. KVOlkl, RNO, Hush:-sällsik. belön. f. odl:fht.
translated: Magnusson, Karl Hilding, gardener, national debt delegate, Skövde, b. 17/12/77 in Hänger, Jönköp. 1st son of Erik M. and Ingrid Larsdotter. M. 05 with Anna Brulin. Children: Lars b. 08, Anna-Stina b. 10, Maja b. 12, Britta b. 13, Karl b. 14, Gunborg b. 16, Märta b. 18, Arne b. 20, Karin b. 22. Studied at Dalarna Folk High School 96-97, Swedish Horticulture Association's gardening school 98-00, vocational studies in Germany 00-01. Study trips with state support in Germany, Netherlands, and Belgium 11. Gardener 01-07, founder of the nursery Convallaria in Skövde 07. Lay judge since 11, member of the church council 14-24, city councilor (conservative) since 17, member of the preparatory committee, tax committee, and the second chamber of parliament since 15, substitute member in temporary committees 15-17, special committee 26, appropriations committee and legal committee 20, member of the second legal committee 21-34, including vice chairman 32-34, member of the state committee 35, special committee 36, state auditor 27 and 30-32, chairman 31-32, second vice speaker 38, first speaker 40, national debt delegate since 36, postsavings bank delegate since 40, member of the 30 years defense committee, population committee, general civil administration committee, remunerated for communication works and Swedish welfare's remunerated 34, Cultural Heritage Board's delegate since 36, State teaching book committee, 42 years defense committee, county council and its administration committee, household society's administration committee, Conservative Party council, etc. Writings: specialized and political essays. Hobbies: flowers and plants, sport fishing, book collecting. Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa, Commander of the Royal Norwegian Order of Merit, Household society's award for horticulture.

honors.name: Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa
Commander of the Royal Norwegian Order of Merit
